name: Appsmith
description: Appsmith is an open-source platform to build and deploy internal tools or admin panels.

APPSMITH_MONGODB_URI.description: Your Mongo Database URI. Since Heroku doesn't support a managed MongoDB instance, you'll have to create a Mongo DB instance on another service such as https://cloud.mongodb.com

APPSMITH_ENCRYPTION_PASSWORD.description: Encryption password to encrypt all sensitive credentials in the database. You can use any random string (Eg. abcd). The more random, the better.

APPSMITH_ENCRYPTION_SALT.description: Encryption salt used to encrypt all sensitive credentials in the database. You can use any random string (Eg. abcd). The more random, the better.

APPSMITH_DISABLE_TELEMETRY.description: We want to be transparent and request that you share anonymous usage data with us. This data is purely statistical in nature and helps us understand your needs & provide better support to your self-hosted instance. You can read more about what information is collected in our documentation https://docs.appsmith.com/v/v1.2.1/setup/telemetry
